message: We found out savelyenne contemplates creating a gap free multi column grid by taking ideas from a responsive navigation plugin without library dependencies and with fast touch screen support and a read the full article: http://buildnewgames.com/real-time-multiplayer/ an example using node.js, socket.io and html5 canvas to explain and demonstrate realtime multiplayer games in the browser. Dangerous stuff.
